title: Monumental Decadentes – La Película
overview: In this thrilling concert film, the legendary band delivers an unforgettable performance at Mexico City's iconic Plaza de Toros in May 2024. The show blends live music with cinematic flair, paying homage to timeless film genres. From the grit of westerns to the chills of horror, the humor of comedies, and the intensity of psychological thrillers, the performance also embraces the futuristic allure of science fiction and the glamour of Hollywood biopics.
